description: Removes a tag from the specified resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource whose tags are to be removed.

parameters.name: tagKeys
parameters.description: A list of tag key names to remove from the resource. You don't specify the value. Both the key and its associated value are removed. This parameter to the API requires a JSON text string argument. For information on how to format a JSON parameter for the various command line tool environments, see Using JSON for Parameters in the AWS CLI User Guide. (string) ---
